about_the_game:
FINALLY!! The Escort - Special Edition is LIVE!!
Enjoy improved renders, extended scenes, creamy endings and an exclusive gallery with a few surprises!

Are you going to regret one of the biggest decisions in your life? Wait, don't answer yet. Someone's knocking at the door. You should go and...

Well... Uh... See it for yourself.



The Escort is a VN for adults with two main characters taking place in just 24 hours. It's essentially a kinetic novel, but it's got some choices here and there, as well as two different endings and 4 paths to get to them.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features several scenes of explicit sexual content and is not suitable for minors. It also contains a non avoidable incestual relationship between two siblings.

The Escort is a VN for adults with two main characters taking place in just 24 hours. It's essentially a kinetic novel, but it's got some choices here and there, as well as two different endings and 4 paths to get to them.

reviews:
“I remember playing this game like a year ago. I like the concept, even if it was a kinetic visual novel. I always wanted more. Now I discovered that the game is finished, and I FREAKING LOVE IT!! It's so simple yet so charming. The models are great and even the funny parts are good (keep an eye on the employee at the hotel). Great work. One of the few (if not the ONLY one) games I keep on my android too.”
5/5 – jaq847

“The vast majority of games on this site waste hours upon hours failing to do what this game does in twenty minutes. Snappy dialogue, a (semi) realistically proportioned woman, a dash of humor and fantastic sex animations. Whomever didn't give this five stars should be ashamed of themselves.”
5/5 – Fennyman

“Short VN, but the developer is extremely promising. Highly recommended short novel, if you're into character models with voluptuous proportions. While short, the story was wholesome, but is centered towards certain fetishes like for example, incest. Overall, a 5/5 from me, because while it was short, it provided everything it needed to and stayed to it's promises in the tags. Looking forward to the new work of this developer.”
5/5 – CoomerKing
short_description: "Wait... This is NOT how the night was supposed to go! I need to lay down and find a way to fix this... Or maybe not?". The Escort is a short Visual Novel where you'll find out what happened to MC in the weirdest night of his life. Wait, was it weirdest or wildest?
